action.title: 查看详细配置内容
action.set: if [ -f "$asguard_path/ASGuard.conf" ]; then cat "$asguard_path/ASGuard.conf" else echo "没有配置文件" fi

action.title: 查看log
action.set: if [[ -f "$asguard_path/log_ASG.txt" ]]; then cat "$asguard_path/log_ASG.txt" else echo "未发现log" fi

action.title: 查看过滤开关
action.set: source "$asguard_path/ASGuard.conf" if [[ -n $(echo ${exclude}) ]]; then echo "${exclude}" | sed "/^$/d" else echo "未发现" fi

action.title: 删除log
action.set: if [[ -f "$asguard_path/log_ASG.txt" ]]; then rm "$asguard_path/log_ASG.txt" echo "已删除" else echo "无log文件" fi
